## Les't Talk Data Science with R !!!

<div style="text-align: justify"> During the first meeting of the Algiers R user group, entitled; «**Let's Talk Data Science With R**» organised the 14th August, 2020 [**Mohamed El Fodil Ihadadden**](https://twitter.com/moh_fodil) introduced the Algiers R user group to the audience, then he gave a brief introduction of his [**batata**](https://github.com/feddelegrand7/batata) package, as a first presentation.</div>
<div style="text-align: justify"> The second presentation was hosted by [**Nassim Kaddour**](https://twitter.com/nssmmn), he gave us an introduction to the [**dash**](https://github.com/plotly/dashR/) package on R, an alternative to shiny.
Then [**Mohamed El Fodil Ihadadden**](https://twitter.com/moh_fodil), came back to make the third and last presentation on [**corazon**](https://github.com/feddelegrand7/corazon) another package he developed.</div>
